dict.string: [Pass](glossary://pass) in a spring to the `setItemA()` [function](glossary://function) to use it as an input to the machine. - callout(Example): ``` setItemA(.spring) setItemB(.metal) forgeItems() ```
Try combining the spring with other items until you make a [final product](glossary://final%20product) for the machine.
You could combine the spring with something soft to make a strange hat of sorts.
